entry.title: Evangaline Buckley Begins
entry.summary:
Author: Not_Ren_42

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,581Chapters: 13/24Kudos: 159

Summary: Evangaline Buckley has been alone for most of her life. She was unwanted by her parents and left by her sister when she had the first chance. For her most formative years, she had to go to extreme lengths just to get attention from those meant to care for her, failing more often than not. After finding out the truth about her creation, Evie decides that she has to do something – anything. She goes through even more pain and heartbreak before finding herself where she was always meant to end up. -+- This is both a prologue and season 1 rewrite. New chapter every Tuesday :)

entry.title: Say something...
entry.summary:
Author: multishipster

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,402Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Buck and Eddie had been inseparable best friends for years, through every crisis, every quiet night, every proof that their bond was unbreakable. It was the one thing neither ever doubted. Then Buck kissed him. It wasn't like with Tommy. Tommy's kiss had surprised Buck, but he'd welcomed it, leaned in, let it linger, opened the door to something new without pulling away. So when Buck closed the distance to Eddie, he expected the same easy acceptance. A moment of surprise, then warmth. A quiet shift that felt inevitable. But Eddie didn't respond that way. He froze. Eyes wide. Breath caught. No gentle return. Just stunned, motionless silence that stretched too long. Buck's stomach dropped. Confusion hit first, then hot shame. He'd miscalculated. He'd ruined everything. Eddie stood there, heart slamming, mind reeling. Raised on rigid machismo and unshakable faith, he'd never let himself consider this. Never allowed the thought to surface. For one frozen second, something in him shifted. And now that truth refused to stay buried.

entry.title: Just one more breath
entry.summary:
Author: CarpeDiem911

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 79,148Chapters: 25/?Kudos: 315

Summary: The hysterical laughter stole every coherent thought from Buck and crawled into his bones; his heart thudded and he stared at the doll in disbelief. Then, as suddenly as it had started, the laughter stopped; leaving an eerie silence. Buck stood frozen, his thoughts like thick mud, staring at that stupid doll. He completely missed the huge hole in the wall above the tub. He missed the shadow standing there, watching him from behind the hole with cold eyes and a malicious smile.

entry.title: chain of command
entry.summary:
Author: madforyou

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,518Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 157

Summary: "I'm kidding, relax." Buck grins at him, radiating false innocence, and takes another sip. "Although I bet if I really wanted you to do something, I'd just have to ask nicely. Say please." He pauses, Eddie can see the mischief brewing, can practically see the gears turning in Buck's head. "Or maybe just call you sir. That seems to work pretty well." Eddie stops breathing. So much for trying to act natural. Buck is watching him now, really watching him with sharp curious eyes and Eddie can feel himself being catalogued, examined, picked apart and analyzed like a bug under a microscope. "I don't know what you're talking about," Eddie says, which is a blatant lie and they both know it. "Sure you don't." Buck pushes off the counter, still smiling that infuriating smile. "Whatever you say, sir." Or,Eddie Diaz and the three letter problem. a 9x08 coda

entry.title: What a night to forget.
entry.summary:
Author: Absolute_Maniac

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,490Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 45

Summary: “Hey, can you see my phone anywhere?” he asked. Eddie started looking around the bed and then stretched himself to his side of the bed and pulled it from the nightstand.“Here.” He tossed it to him, and Buck immediately started looking through recent pictures on his phone. Pictures of them partying, a video of Eddie taking a shot, and another video of Eddie dancing.Then he came across the next picture and felt as if someone had thrown a bucket of ice water over his head. They must have asked someone else to take the picture because it was taken from at least a two-meter distance. The two of them were holding out a piece of paper towards the camera… and they were pressed together in a passionate kiss.Buck looked up from the picture when Eddie made a strangled sound on the other side of the room. “You might want to see this…” He reached over with a piece of paper in his hand. Buck took it and turned his phone over to him in return. Eddie bit into his fist as he studied the picture. Buck looked down at the paper in his hand and turned it over to the right side. It was a copy of a marriage license for Mr. Evan Buckley-Diaz and Mr. Edmundo Buckley-Diaz.

entry.title: Nothing Left To Do
entry.summary:
Author: hyperfixatedhoney

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,978Chapters: 12/15Kudos: 62

Summary: “Buck,” Eddie is standing next to Buck but shifts to look Buck in the eye. There’s a look in Eddie’s eyes that Buck refuses to let himself acknowledge. It’s soft, welcoming, it makes Buck believe whatever Eddie says, “I’m sure it’ll be fine. We probably just missed out on a hitter, there was that one guy out of Austin Bobby was trying to get”“Yeah, you’re right,” Buck agreed, Eddie was right, it’ll be okay, “Well, nothing left to do but win huh?”Eddie smiles, gentle and sincere, “Nothing left to do but win”.OR: Buddie Baseball AU (no actual knowledge of baseball required)

entry.title: Wishing in the Dark, Dancing in the Dark
entry.summary:
Author: TheRealBagelGod

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,502Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 15

Summary: Eddie Diaz is a 16 year old ballroom dancer with an immense amount of pressure put on him by his parents. When he meets Evan, younger brother of fellow dancer Maddie Buckley, his life takes a turn for the better, and becomes a lot more complicated.   Neither boy says anything as they walk, but when Eddie stops in front of a door with “Buckley” posted on the front, Eddie realises something.  “Wait, Buckley?” He asks.  The boy nods, looking a bit confused. “Why?”  “Are you Maddie’s brother?”  The boy’s confusion morphs into surprise. “Uh, yeah. You- you know Maddie?”  Eddie nods. “We met a few years ago. She basically adopted all the younger kids as her siblings and we’ve been to a lot of the same comps.”  The boy smiles softly. “Yeah, that sounds like her.”  “She talks about you a lot.” Eddie says. “Though I’ve somehow missed your name.”  “Oh.” The boy says, then adjusts his crutches so he can hold out his hand for Eddie. “Evan.”  Eddie takes his hand and tries to ignore the butterflies that erupt in his stomach at the contact. “Eddie. Diaz.”  “It’s nice to meet you.”  “You too.”    CURRENTLY BEING RE-WRITTEN!!!

entry.title: The Lazy Astronomer
entry.summary:
Author: vinimental

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,134Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 4

Summary: Eddie’s life is fine, until a stranger asks him what he wants from it and he realises he hasn’t let himself answer that question in years. So he starts looking for what he’s been missing.Buck notices. He finds a safe place in an old astronomy tower, and a kind of hope and confusion he doesn’t know what to do with. Neither of them is ready for how much they want to be part of each other’s lives again.But the universe is patient. It gives them endless sunsets, clear nights, meteor showers, and Eddie learns that sometimes the truth has been on its way to you for a long time.
